about_the_game:
Overview

The place I sneaked into to find the treasure was a scary place.

A plaster statue that makes you go blind if you touch it, a vase that entangles your arms.

Choose safe survival or take risks and choose riches

It's up to the player to become a millionaire!

New survival horror from gemmy games

For players who become treasure hunters

The ultimate choice approaches!

About this game

  • Online multiplayer cooperative play for up to 4 people is possible, and single play is also possible.

  • There is an occupation system, and each occupation has skills that make searching for psychic relics advantageous.

  • There is a PERK system, and the more you play, the more advantageous you will be in searching for psychic relics.

  • There is a collection system, and once you have collected psychic relics, you can freely check them again in the warehouse.

  • Each psychic relic has a debuff set, and when lifted, it brings various effects.

How to operate

W/A/S/D - Move

E - Lifting/lowering psy-relics

F - Load psy-relics (only valid in front of vehicles)

B - Voice call using walkie-talkie

Shift - Dash

Ctrl - Crouch

Mouse wheel - item switching

Content production/distribution guidelines

Please feel free to post and distribute videos regardless of whether you are an individual or a corporation.

Please include the name of the game in the title of your video and stream.

Example) psychological relic hunter

Please refrain from reprinting or secondary distribution without permission.

Please refrain from analyzing the game and reusing internal assets without permission.

We are not responsible for any damage that may occur during content production/distribution. note that.

We would appreciate it if you could include a link to your Steam page in the summary section.

These guidelines are subject to change without notice.
